bug.author: ronamadthis
bug.summary: Does not show points on the map with uber_pickups tutorial. The bar plot is ok.
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
Type here a clear and concise description of the bug. Aim for 2-3 sentences. <denchmark-h:h1>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
What are the steps we should take to reproduce the bug:
Go to '...' Click on '....' Scroll down to '....'
<denchmark-h:h2>Expected behavior:</denchmark-h>
Explain what you expect to happen when you go through the steps above, assuming there were no bugs. <denchmark-h:h2>Actual behavior:</denchmark-h>
Explain the buggy behavior you experience when you go through the steps above. If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem. <denchmark-h:h2>Is this a regression?</denchmark-h>
That is, did this use to work the way you expected in the past? yes / no <denchmark-h:h1>Debug info</denchmark-h>
Streamlit version: (get it with $ streamlit version) Python version: (get it with $ python --version) Using Conda? PipEnv? PyEnv? Pex? OS version: Browser version:
<denchmark-h:h1>Additional information</denchmark-h>
If needed, add any other context about the problem here. For exmaple, did this bug come from <denchmark-link:https://discuss.streamlit.io>https://discuss.streamlit.io</denchmark-link> or another site? Link the original source here!

comments.comment:
HI <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ronamadthis>@ronamadthis</denchmark-link> , Thanks for trying out Streamlit! Unfortunately I can't reproduce your bug; I just tried out the demo in streamlit 0.52 (current for when you filed this bug) and in streamlit 0.53 (the latest as of today) without seeing the issue. We'd like to try to reproduce the bug you're seeing. To do so we'll need more information about the problem on your end. Can you edit your bug report to include the following:
Which OS you're on Which browser you're using Which version of python you're using Which version of Streamlit you have.
Thanks!

We just merged in an improvement to the visibility of map dots (see <denchmark-link:https://github.com/streamlit/streamlit/issues/1103>#1103</denchmark-link> ). If this issue comes up again, please file a new bug! Thanks!
